t: Amazon.com : Bheka Deluxe Long Life Yoga Mat Purple 72 Inches Long by 24 Inches Wide : Sports & Outdoors
s: I have the Deluxe and Standard Bheka mats--both I use in my home practice. The Deluxe is thicker (not too thick) and provides sufficient cushioning yet gives your feet a feeling for the floor which is important for stability. The Standard mat is light enough for travel. I have used other yoga mats. My natural rubber yoga mat while it gives good traction, attracts dirt and lint easily and is not the easiest to clean. Another mat made by a well-known brand ...
